name: Kinja Sidebar Remover
description:
This style removes the sidebar from gawker media sites. No more "popular stories". It also expands the articles and comments to make use of the vacated space so those on big screens have less whitespace.
Updated for nukinja breakage.
additional_info: V2.4 More tweaking as gawker continues fiddling with their own style sheet. V2.3 Further tweak to deal with annoying fade containers for adverts. V2.2 Further minor tweak due to kinja weirdness. V2.1 Added a light grey background to make reading easier on the eye. V2.0 Preliminary adjustment for the latest kinja overhaul march/2014. V1.1 Incorporates a tweak suggested by trespassersW V1.0 This is basically a very minor tinkering to Whiskey in the Shade's Groupthink Sidebar - BURN IT DOWN! style.
